00003 string YardShipType::ToString(const string& delim) const {
00004     
00005     stringstream output;
00006     char q = '\'';
00007     output << 
00008         q << GetShipType() q << delim 
00009         << GetCarrierIdS() << delim 
00010         << GetCostS() << delim
00011         << GetEnabledS();
00012     
00013     return output.str();
00014         
00015 }

00032     YardShipType test2(test1);
00033

00035     
00036     YardShipType test3;
00037     
00038     test3 = test2;
00039     
00040     VERIFY(test3.GetCarrierID(), test2.GetCarrierID());
00041     VERIFY(test3.GetCost(), test2.GetCost());
00042     VERIFY(test3.GetEnabled(), test2.GetEnabled());
00043 
00044 
00045     vector<YardShipType> anArray;
00046     
00047     anArray.push_back(test1);
00048     anArray.push_back(test2);
00049     anArray.push_back(test3);
00050     
00051     VERIFY(anArray[1].GetCarrierID(), anArray[2].GetCarrierID());
00052     
00053     vector<YardShipType> copyArray;
00054     copyArray = anArray;
00055     
00056     VERIFY(anArray[0].GetCost(), copyArray[0].GetCost());
00057 
00058     return failure;
